turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey J, I'd like for you to order my afternoon coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location would you like to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about the one in the IDS Center near 8th and Nicollet in Minneapolis

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What would you like to have?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just a plain coffee, please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Which size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What sizes are there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Generally a small, medium and large

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a medium please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which roast? Light, medium or dark?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium roast please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And I assume that is regular and not decaf

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: that is correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like and cream or sugar in the coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, black please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What time what time would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How soon can it be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It looks like the wait time is less than 5 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, how about 15 minutes from now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will place your order. Would you like me to use the gift card on file, or pay with a credit card?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What is my giftcard balance?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It is $10.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's use my giftcard to pay for the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Payment has been made, and your order will be ready at the Starbucks on 8th and Nicollet in about 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
